name: Night Slashers
description: Night Slashers is a 1993 side scrolling beat'em up arcade game developed by Data East in a world full of zombies, vampires, and other monsters. Player can choose a hero from 3 characters: Jake White - an American monster hunter with cybernetic arms; Christopher Pal, a European vampire hunter and martial artist, and Zhao Hong Hua - a female martial artist from Asia, proficient in the mystic arts. Gameplay is similar to Final Fight, and typical for the genre - the player track right and fights against enemies and bosses.
